mapper.select: select managerId,managerName ,managerPassword from cmfz_manager where managerName=#{managerName} and managerPassword=#{managerPassword}
select managerId,managerName ,managerPassword from cmfz_manager where managerId=#{managerId}
mapper.insert:
select seq_manager.nextval from dual
insert into cmfz_manager values(#{managerId},#{managerName},#{managerPassword})
mapper.update: update cmfz_manager set managerName=#{managerName} ,managerPassword=#{managerPassword} where managerId=#{managerId}
